backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor for tournaments, teams, players, matches, innings, and scoring, with authorization integration and in‑memory maps for all entities.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, and test references for authentication, UI shell, theming, and tournament management.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries for all major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and layout.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and a green-themed OKLCH design system for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, TournamentProvider, and AppShell.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter a name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/scoring/LiveScor: UI panel for selecting players and recording ball-by-ball scoring events using addBall mutations.
frontend/src/components/tournaments/Tour: Dropdown and dialog for selecting or creating tournaments, auto-selecting the first available option.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity, invalidating related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides authenticated user state and profile info from Internet Identity and backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor API calls for tournaments, teams, players, and mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus cricket-themed color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/layout/AppShell.tsx: Main layout with sidebar, mobile navigation, login button, and optional profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/layout/SidebarNav.tsx: Sidebar navigation with logo, tournament switcher, nav links, and login/footer elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing match, team, and player stats plus a recent matches list.
frontend/src/pages/LiveScoringPage.tsx: Live scoring view that loads match data, validates state, and renders the scoring panel.
frontend/src/pages/MatchesPage.tsx: Matches list with creation dialog, filtering by tournament, and links to scoring pages.
frontend/src/pages/MatchReportPage.tsx: Match report page displaying placeholder summary and team details pending backend support.
frontend/src/pages/PlayerDetailPage.tsx: Player detail page showing basic player info and placeholder batting/bowling stats.
frontend/src/pages/PlayersPage.tsx: Players management page that lists players and allows authenticated users to create new ones with optional team assignment.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Displays completed match reports for the active tournament or prompts the user if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/ScoreboardPage.tsx: Shows basic match metadata and placeholder scoreboard info for a selected match.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDetailPage.tsx: Shows details and roster for a specific team, with captain indicators and a note about pending backend features.
frontend/src/pages/TeamsPage.tsx: Lists teams for the active tournament and allows authenticated users to create new teams.
frontend/src/state/TournamentContext.tsx: Provides context for managing and persisting the active tournament ID in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin usage for the frontend UI theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the SaaS cricket app’s scope, architecture notes, required images, and a list of implemented features with versioning.
